name: Line chart
$-def:addDatasetLoopScript:
changePointsInAnimation(pathItem, srcPoints, dstPoints, t)
pathItem.setOpacity(100 * t)

$-def:removeDatasetLoopScript.$-str:
changePointsInAnimation(pathItem, srcPoints, dstPoints, t)
pathItem.setOpacity(100 * (1 - t))

args.name: name
args.description: The name of a dataset that should be removed from the plot
